(Airly, please post damage.  I opened fire on you with Sixshot and Dark One.  
Dark One, still behind you, fired off two energy-signature seeking missiles 
at Windlord.  Sixshot, who had pulled ahead, had stopped while you were 
coming straight at him and fired off two energy-signature seeking missiles)
